# API Keys Configuration
# You can specify keys with prefixes or just put them directly
# OpenAI keys start with "sk-"
# Gemini keys are longer alphanumeric strings

# Format 1: With prefixes (recommended)
openai:sk-your-openai-key-here
gemini:your-gemini-api-key-here

# Format 2: Direct keys (auto-detected)
# sk-another-openai-key-here
# another-gemini-key-here

# Format 3: Multiple keys for load balancing
# openai:sk-key1-here
# openai:sk-key2-here  
# gemini:gemini-key1-here
# gemini:gemini-key2-here

# Lines starting with # are ignored
# Empty lines are ignored
